name: Nimbrung
description: Nimbrung is a chat application like whatsapp or telegram, but use google account for login. You can search friends by google email.

name: Whytrip
description: Whytrip is a website to introduce tourism in every province in Indonesia. This website has features for forecasting the weather, 360-degree videos, recommendations for equipment to bring, etc.

name: Fimo
description: Fimo stands for Financial Mom. This application is made for career mothers, but can be used for other mothers. Its features include financial management, social gathering, blogs, consulting, plans, etc.

name: SemarVest
description: Semarvest is a website application for capital for MSMEs that need funds. There are several features such as capital, training, investment. The main goal is to promote local MSMEs.
